mapper.select: SELECT LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(SUBSTRING(reservationid, 12)), 0) + 1, 5, '0') FROM tickets WHERE reservationid LIKE CONCAT('reservation', #{date}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tickets ( reservationid, matchid, quantity, price, userid, reservationdate, paymentmethodcode, reservationstatus, collectionmethodcode, membermembershipid, methodcode, couponid, usedpoints, finalpaymentamount, shippingstartdate, shippingenddate, shippingstatus, recipientname, shippingaddress, shippingrequest ) VALUES ( #{reservationid}, #{matchid}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{userid}, #{reservationdate}, #{paymentmethodcode}, #{reservationstatus}, #{collectionmethodcode}, #{membermembershipid}, #{methodcode}, #{couponid}, #{usedpoints}, #{finalpaymentamount}, #{shippingstartdate}, #{shippingenddate}, #{shippingstatus}, #{recipientname}, #{shippingaddress}, #{shippingrequest} )

INSERT INTO ticketdetails (reservationid, matchid, seatid, price, totalamount, iscanceled, isrefunded) VALUES (#{reservationid}, #{matchid}, #{seatid}, #{price}, #{totalamount}, #{iscanceled}, #{isrefunded})
